name: Kuyaw!
overview: Kuyaw, is a regional variety show of GMA Network Channel 5 Davao that airs Sundays, 11:00 a.m. to 12:00 noon, catering to both young and adult audiences. Dubbed as Mindanao's "Fiesta TV", the show is hosted by young and energetic bunch of homegrown talents, twins K1 and K2, Bea dela Fuente and Niko Ferrer. The show was launched in October 2005 during the first GMA Kapuso Fans Day in Davao City.
